title: Do children learn better with technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes But children do not know the advantages and disadvantages of technology and in today's time, technology attracts more children who can stray their path along with learning! You have to understand that technology is benefiting or harming your child. Technology has its advantages and disadvantages. By the time the child learns, everything is fine, but if the child is addicted then it can be harmful.
